bool GUI::draw (  ) 

Go through all the GUI elements defined and tell them to draw themselvs Do this after setting up the proper 2D orthoganal

Stolen shamelessly from http://www.gamedev.net/community/forums/topic.asp?topic_id=104791 Thank you so much, this is a VERY clever way of doing it

This basically sets up a simple 2d orthogo world for us to render into So far as I can tell with the few tweeks I put in there it will adjust everything so that the mouse events that come in from SDL will directly map to the position you are drawing on the screen inside this block of code
